name:
A sequence of fibonacci strings is generated as follows:
S0="a", S1="b", Sn=S(n-1)+S(n-2)
where + denotes concatenation. Thus the sequence is:
 a, b, ba, bab, babba, babbabab, ..., n terms.
Design a class FiboString to generate fibonacci strings.

Design a class NumDude to check if a given number is a Dudeney number or not. (A Dudeney number is a postive integer that is a perfect cube, such that the sum of its digits is equal to the cube root of the nubmer.)\nExample: 5832 = (5+8+3+2)³ = (18)³ = 5832
A class Trans is defined to find the transpose of a square matrix. A transpose of a matrix is obtained by interchanging the elements of the rows and columns.

A class Exchange accepts a sentence and interchange the first alphabet with the last alphabet for each word in the sentence, with single letter the word remains unchanged. The words in the input sentece are separed by a single blank space and terminated by a full stop.
A class Revstr defines a recursive function to reverse a string and check whether it is a palindrome or not.
